update user_quick_order_driver
order_number = #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where driver_code = #{driverCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update user_quick_order_driver set order_number = #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, plate_number = #{plateNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, driver_real_name = #{driverRealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, driver_phone = #{driverPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, coal_sales_id = #{coalSalesId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, coal_sales_user = #{coalSalesUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mine_mouth_id = #{mineMouthId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where driver_code = #{driverCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select a.*,ifnull(b.real_name,nickname)nickname,b.user_mobile from user_quick_order_driver a LEFT JOIN user_info b on a.creator=b.user_id where order_number = #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
